statements.select: SELECT * FROM ProduceMaterial p WHERE p.ProduceMaterialID IN(SELECT d.ProduceMaterialID FROM ProduceMaterialdetails d WHERE d.ProduceMaterialID=p.ProduceMaterialID and MRSHeaderId=#value# OR PronoteHeaderID=#value#)
SELECT * FROM ProduceMaterial where ProduceMaterialDate between #startdate# and #enddate# $sql$ order by ProduceMaterialId desc
select * from ProduceMaterial where DepotOutState<>2 or DepotOutState is null
select case when exists( select * from dbo.ProduceMaterial where ProduceMaterialID=#value# ) then 1 else 0 end

SELECT * FROM ProduceMaterial pm WHERE ((pm.ProduceMaterialDate>=#starDate# OR #starDate# IS NULL) AND (pm.ProduceMaterialDate<=#endDate# OR #endDate# IS NULL)) AND ((pm.ProduceMaterialID>=#produceMaterialId0# OR #produceMaterialId0# IS NULL) AND (pm.ProduceMaterialID<=#produceMaterialId1# OR #produceMaterialId1# IS NULL)) AND ProduceMaterialID in(select ProduceMaterialID from ProduceMaterialdetails where productid IN (SELECT ProductId FROM Product WHERE (ProductName>=#pId0# OR #pId0# IS NULL) AND (ProductName<=#pId1# OR #pId1# IS NULL))) AND (pm.WorkHouseId= #dId0# or #dId0# is null) AND (pm.InvoiceId>=#pronoteId0# OR #pronoteId0# IS NULL) AND (pm.InvoiceId<=#pronoteId1# OR #pronoteId1# IS NULL)
select case when exists(select * from DepotOutDetail where ProduceMaterialdetailsID in (select ProduceMaterialdetailsID from ProduceMaterialdetails where ProduceMaterialID=#value#)) then 1 else 0 end
